name: Y.A.N.A. Distress Center
description:
YANA (You Are Not Alone) Distress Center was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 - All Code, 3D Models, Animations, Sprites (Images), Character Drawings, Music, and SFX were created from scratch within the game jam's 1-week time limit. 

Controls 
Interact: Left-click
Spaceship (Fly): Arrow Keys
Spaceship (Shoot): Space

Credits
IamKiDSiD - SFX, Music, Logo, Story
xgcomicart - Character Art, Story
jpfuzzerton - 3D Models, Animations, Textures, Story
tutmo - Code, Animations, Story

Tools 
Game Engine - Unity
3D Models - Blender
Music/SFX - Garage Band & FL Studio
Sprites/Textures - Photoshop & Procreate
Character Art - Clip Studio Paint & Procreate
